title: Jillian's 2018 Lightbulb Moment
description:
Jillian reveals a major epiphany about how to keep the most important relationships in your life healthy and strong and cut out the people that bring you down once and for all. Plus, top food trends of 2018 to boost your metabolism, enhance your immunity, and give you beautiful hair, skin, and nails. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
